title: OCE TOURNAMENT, LOOKING FOR PLATINUM AND ABOVE!
body:
Hello all,

My name is Panterra and Im one of the head staff of a gaming community known as Kawaii Network, We have currently started setting up a Tournament that should take place in 2-4 weeks. It will be streamed live with commentators, we will have 2 divisions, it will be point based best out of 3 games to move up the ladder and will be held over the course of a Saturday and Sunday.

If it gains enough popularity we hope to make it a Quarterly thing (every 3 months). Right now we are coming close to the filling point for our Division 2 teams (gold and lower) and we now need more Division 1 teams (plat and higher).

You can be a Solo player to be matched into a team, a Full team, or a team of 3-4 players that need solo players to fill.

Requirements:

-Platinum rank or higher
-Oce

To contact me about entering into this tournament pm me via steam https://steamcommunity.com/id/Panterra-Arius/ or our website http://kawaiinetwork.net/showthread.php?tid=187 your welcome to even comment your team on the "Kawaii Teams LCS" thread.

NOTE: do not contact me via this discussion as I will not be visiting it often.

replies.body:
Plat rank or higher.... Bruh u bronze 1. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I didnt say I was playing in the Division one did I? I said im helping host the tournament.

Panterra,

Hope all is well.
This sounds like a fantastic idea. I will be keeping an eye on this.
I believe we do need an Oceania tournament.
You have my support.

Yours truly, 

XI

Hi Eleven,

We have a new tournament coming up support by our new community Orbital Gaming. - http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/207916 -

If you have a team and your interested in registering that would be awesome, though if you are solo looking to try out for a team we could work something out as well, our community currently has a A team and a B team that represent us in tournaments run by other communities. Team A is currently looking for a ADC and Team B still has 3 spots free.

If you'd be interested in trying out simply join our website and send me a message on the website, my name is Panterra there also - http://orbitalgamingau.com/

Hey, my name is Rain, and I'm interested in joining a competitive ranked team, so if that's something you can offer me, that'd be fantastic. Cheers. 

IGN: Smööthie

Elo (currently): Diamond V (Highest so far. I ended up in Platinum V last season, and got Gold I through this season's provisionals.)

Main role: Support  {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:98}}        

Availability: Just about any day except Monday and Tuesday.

OP.GG: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Sm%C3%B6%C3%B6thie

Most played --> Janna (6.56:1 KDA, 64% Win-rate, 64 games)

Hi Rain,

We have a new tournament coming up support by our new community Orbital Gaming. - http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/207916 -

If you have a team and your interested in registering that would be awesome, though if you are solo looking to try out for a team we could work something out as well, our community currently has a A team and a B team that represent us in tournaments run by other communities. Team A is currently looking for a ADC and Team B still has 3 spots free.

If you'd be interested in trying out simply join our website and send me a message on the website, my name is Panterra there also - http://orbitalgamingau.com/
